Text:
Bless your heart Sir!!! The entire official GD.net merchandise debacle has turned into such a complete cluster-fuck with people's orders not being shipped/filled, or folks receiving cracked discs and banged up boxes, and customer support being unforgivably clueless positively useless, I'm supremely grateful that someone has stepped up and provided this offering, especially in a lossless format :D
Thank you so much!!!!

What a great share.... I've been listening to this for a few days now and I forgot how they caught the groove again after the mainstream caught on in '87 after "Touch of Grey"

I'm sure you have it, but if not check this out from october 1989 through april 1990:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6052422/GRATEFUL_DEAD_1989-1990_(Without_A_Net)_FLAC
